Generation VII.Sun: This wary Pokémon uses photosynthesis to store up energy during the day, while becoming active at night.
Generation VII.Moon: Silently it glides, drawing near its targets. Before they even notice it, it begins to pelt them with vicious kicks.
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: It sends its feathers, which are as sharp as blades, flying in attack. Its legs are strong, so its kicks are also formidable.
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: It feels relaxed in tight, dark places and has been known to use its Trainer's pocket or bag as a nest.

Generation VIII.Sword: At a distance, it launches its sharp feathers while flying about. If the enemy gets too close, Rowlet switches tactics and delivers vicious kicks. *
Generation VIII.Shield: During the day, it builds up energy via photosynthesis. At night, it flies silently through the sky, on the prowl for prey. *
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Flies noiselessly on delicate wings. It has mastered the art of deftly launching dagger-sharp feathers from those same wings.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Silently it glides, streaking toward its targets to get close to them. Before they even notice it, it begins to pelt them with vicious kicks.
Generation IX.Violet: It feels relaxed in tight, dark places and has been known to nestle into its Trainer’s bag or the front of their jacket.

Generation VII.Sun: First partner Pokémon from Hala in Iki Town
Generation VII.Moon: First partner Pokémon from Hala in Iki Town
Generation VII.Ultra Sun: First partner Pokémon from Professor Kukui in Route 1
Generation VII.Ultra Moon: First partner Pokémon from Professor Kukui in Route 1

Generation VIII.Expansion Pass: Reward for finding at least 100 Alolan Diglett (if the player chose Grookey )
Generation VIII.Legends: Arceus: Jubilife Village : First partner Pokémon from Professor Laventon , Received from Professor Laventon (after completing Mission 18, if the player did not choose Rowlet) Coronet Highlands : Space-time distortions (after completing Mission 18), massive mass outbreaks (after completing Request 102)

Generation IX.Scarlet: Trade , Breed Decidueye or Hisuian Decidueye
Generation IX.Violet: Trade , Breed Decidueye or Hisuian Decidueye
Generation IX.The Hidden Treasure of Area Zero: Savanna Biome (after boosting biodiversity in the Savanna Biome)
